vlive.korean: 원래 그렇게 하면서 성장해가는 거겠지? - 이 정도면 되나요? That's how they grow? - How about this size? 듣기 View video X1 : 송편만들기🌕
vlive.english: That's how they grow? - How about this size?

vlive.korean: [점점 성장해 나갈 우진이를 기대하며] 그렇죠? [Looking forward to seeing WOO JIN's growth] Right? 듣기 View video AB6IX : AB6IX (에이비식스) DEBUT D-DAY #2
vlive.english: [Looking forward to seeing WOO JIN's growth] Right?

vlive.korean: 그만큼 저희들도 성장해 온 것 같아요. We've grown up. 듣기 View video B1A4 : B1A4 데뷔7주년!★VLIVE 토크쇼★
성장해나간다는 걸 여러분 알고 계시죠? They are growing, right? 듣기 View video Cherry Bullet : [FULL] Cherry Bullet DEBUT SHOWCASE
뭔가 자꾸 성장해 가는 그런 느낌. It feels like they keep grwoing. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : [Replay] THE BOYZ COMEBACK SHOWCASE ‘ONE & ONLY’
vlive.english: It feels like they keep grwoing.

examples.korean: The club has grown rapidly since its inception in 1990. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 클럽은 1990년에 시작된 후로 빠르게 성장해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The club has grown rapidly since its inception in 1990. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The place has rapidly developed from a small fishing community into a thriving tourist resort. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 곳은 작은 어촌 사회에서 번창하는 관광 휴양지로 빠르게 성장해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The place has rapidly developed from a small fishing community into a thriving tourist resort. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Thanks to the Internet, my children have grown up as globopolitans. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 인터넷 덕분에 우리 아이들은 세계인으로 성장해 왔다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Thanks to the Internet, my children have grown up as globopolitans. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He grew up foot by foot. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 차츰 성장해 갔다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He grew up foot by foot. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The corporation, which underwent a major restructuring seven years ago, has been growing steadily for five years. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 7년 전 대규모 구조조정을 단행했던 그 회사는 지난 5년간 꾸준히 성장해 왔다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The corporation, which underwent a major restructuring seven years ago, has been growing steadily for five years. Add to Wordbook
